properties.name: value
properties.description: Default Phone Number

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label of Phone Number

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Placeholder

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Enable or Disable of dropdown

properties.name: disabledFormatting
properties.description: Disable the format of phone number

properties.name: invalidMsg
properties.description: Message that can be displayed when the phone number is invalid

properties.name: required
properties.description: required props

properties.name: defaultCountry
properties.description: Default country

properties.name: enabledCountryCode
properties.description: Show country code next to the flag

properties.name: enabledFlags
properties.description: Show flags at the top of the dropdown

properties.name: preferredCountries
properties.description: Array of countries that can be at top of the list

properties.name: onlyCountries
properties.description: Display only the countrie in Array

properties.name: ignoredCountries
properties.description: Remove countries in this Array

properties.name: autocomplete
properties.description: Complete the Phone Number automatically based on history

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of input field

properties.name: inputClasses
properties.description: Classes of input field

properties.name: dropdownOptions
properties.description: Options which can be at the items of dropdown list

properties.name: inputOptions
properties.description: Options which can be inputted from Input field

properties.name: maxLen
properties.description: Max length of inputted numbers

properties.name: showValidations
properties.description: Responsible for showing valid backlight

properties.name: width
properties.description: Setup the width

properties.name: listHeight
properties.description: Setup the height of country codes list

properties.name: validators
properties.description: Array of validator Objects. When multiple validators fail, only one error is displayed, determined by their order in the array. Each Object should have three fields:

subProperty.name: message
subProperty.description: Error message that shown when validation fails

subProperty.name: validator
subProperty.description: Function that takes input value as an argument and returns Boolean

properties.name: referenceModel
properties.description: Provided value for validation purpose like equality models of Input component and any other model

events.name: onInput({ number, isValid, country })
events.description: Emitted when the input value changes

events.name: validation
events.description: Emitted when the input value changes.
